text:
Hydroquinone-induced localized exogenous ochronosis treated with dermabrasion and CO2 laser.
 Exogenous localized ochronosis can result from the repeated use of hydroquinone-containing creams, many of which are available over the counter.
 We report a case that was managed by dermabrasion and CO2 laser.
 The incidence and proposed etiologies of hydroquinone-induced exogenous ochronosis are reviewed.
